creator: sebastian@nohn.net
text:
It should be possible to continue the execution of a testplan at that point one
stopped it before.

creator: michel.nolard@gmail.com
text:
(In reply to comment #0)
> It should be possible to continue the execution of a testplan at that point one
> stopped it before.

Some kind of "pause / resume" action should be available which would give some
time to be sure things are done well. This time would let the user browse the
already available results and decide if (s)he wants to go on with the testplan
or abort the operation.

<not_serious_mode>
The impossibility of pausing the run makes JMeter act as a real-time RPG : if
you're not fast enough, you're dead. Ok, I'll stop playing Starcraft :p
</not_serious_mode>
